text: The Loh Guan Lye Specialists Centre is a 273-bed private hospital in the city of George Town in Penang, Malaysia. Located at Macalister Road, it was established in 1975 and has been expanded over the years. The hospital now consists of three wings - the Main Wing, a Diagnostic Wing, and a Women & Children Wing. == History == The hospital, founded in 1975, was named after its founder, Dr Loh Guan Lye. It has since been expanded, with the completion of a 10-storey wing in 2009. == Services == Among the services provided by the hospital are as follows. * Gastroenterology, hepatology and therapeutic endoscopy * Endocrine surgery * Breast surgery * Radiotherapy * Chemotherapy * Cardiology and cardiothoracic surgery * Orthopedic surgery * Otorhinolaryngology * Obstetrics * Gynaecology * Colorectal surgery * Neurosurgery * Neurology * Urology * Cochlear implant * CT scanning * In vitro fertilisation == See also == * List of hospitals in Malaysia == References == Category:Hospitals in Penang Category:Hospitals established in 1975 __INDEX__
